医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肯特公司 Bedfont® Scientific Ltd 推出新的幸福花园，培养员工健康和生物多样性Bedfont® 自豪地宣布成功将未使用的空间改造成健康花园。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Kent-Company-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Ltd-reveals-New-Well-being-Garden-Nurturing-Employee-Wellness-and-Biodiversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Kent-Company-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Ltd-reveals-New-Well-being-Garden-Nurturing-Employee-Wellness-and-Biodiversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6979aa80-e64a-43c3-ad93-cdc5a0c57911 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 03:53:00 -0400 Kent Company, Bedfont® Scientific Ltd, reveals New Well-being Garden, Nurturing Employee Wellness and Biodiversity
使用 Life's Essential 8 评分预测心血管事件的风险研究人员确定了 LE8 评分与心血管疾病、亚型 CVD 事件和全因死亡率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Predicting-risk-of-cardioangio-events-with-Lifes-Essential-8-scores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Predicting-risk-of-cardioangio-events-with-Lifes-Essential-8-scores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e73092fe-1afc-4b96-ab61-ec5258e60c87 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 03:36:00 -0400 Predicting risk of cardiovascular events with Life's Essential 8 scores
mTOR 信号传导调节细胞毒性 T 细胞分化和耗竭研究人员描述了记忆细胞和耗尽细胞毒性 CD8+ T 淋巴细胞中 mTOR 调节的分子信号传导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Regulation-of-cyto毒-T-细胞-分化-and-exhaustion-by-mTOR-signalling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Regulation-of-cyto毒-T-cell- Differentiation-and-exhaustion-by-mTOR-signalling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49a6c942-ef64-4e4b-96b9-3c45bbf60c56 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 03:15:00 -0400 Regulation of cytotoxic T-cell differentiation and exhaustion by mTOR signaling
整个童年时期遭受人际暴力会增加患糖尿病的风险爱思唯尔 (Elsevier) 发表在《美国预防医学杂志》上的一项新研究结果显示，在儿童期或成年期接触人际暴力会使个人患成人期糖尿病的几率增加 20% 以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Exposure-to-interpersonal-violence-throughout-childhood-increases-the-risk-of-developmenting-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Exposure-to-interpersonal-violence-throughout-childhood-increases-the-risk-of-developmenting-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b92e21bd-f271-4bfb-bf2a-5f98b867f247 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 01:36:12 -0400 Exposure to interpersonal violence throughout childhood increases the risk of developing diabetes
新研究解开了 COVID-19 患者的味觉和嗅觉嗅觉丧失成为 COVID-19 大流行初期的主要症状，并引发了对嗅觉和味觉如何发挥作用的研究。由全球化学感应研究联盟 (GCCR) 和莫内尔化学感官中心牵头的一项国际研究将 COVID-19 患者的味觉与嗅觉分开，在超过 10,000 人的庞大且多样化的群体中证明，味觉与嗅觉无关，也受到新冠疫情的巨大影响。该团队最近在《Chemical Senses》上发表了他们的发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-study-untied-taste-from-smell-in-people-with-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-study-untied-taste-from-smell-in-people-with-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5d81bff-12ad-4cde-8736-a6163698c815 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 01:30:20 -0400 New study untied taste from smell in people with COVID-19
研究发现，在流感感染前几个月，免疫细胞就存在于人体内圣裘德儿童研究医院的科学家与环境科学研究所 (ESR) 有限公司合作发现，与目前的方法相比，在流感（流感）感染前几个月存在于人体中的免疫细胞可以更准确地预测一个人是否会出现症状主要依赖于抗体水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Immune-cells-present-in-people-months-before-influenza-infection-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Immune-cells-present-in-people-months-before-influenza-infection-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b737836c-edf0-4a4e-bf5d-2f35146382c1 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 01:22:06 -0400 Immune cells present in people months before influenza infection, finds study
新发现可以开发有效的基孔肯雅热疫苗或治疗方法阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦医学院的研究人员发现，导致基孔肯雅热的病毒可以直接从一个细胞传播到另一个细胞，这或许可以解决这个长期存在的谜团，即这种现在成为主要健康威胁的病毒如何能够逃脱体内循环的抗体。血流。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-findings-could-develop- effective-vaccines-or-treatments-for-chikungunya-fever.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-findings-could-develop- effective-vaccines-or-treatments-for-chikungunya-fever.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87ba8c1c-4c0f-4645-b2ec-8806de1017a2 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 01:03:34 -0400 New findings could develop effective vaccines or treatments for chikungunya fever
研究评估了同时检测 MPVX 的两种多重实时 PCR 检测本研究提出并评估了两种多重实时 PCR 检测方法，用于同时检测和分化猴痘病毒 (MPXV)，具有高特异性和灵敏度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Study-evaluates-two- Multiplex-real-time-PCR-assays-for-simultaneous-detection-of-MPVX.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Study-evaluates-two- Multiplex-real-time-PCR-assays-for-simultaneous-detection-of-MPVX.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a55d4240-b4cd-4919-a792-e5e8fe9afbab Fri, 18 Aug 2023 00:52:25 -0400
研究发现血小板可以平息衰老大脑和身体的炎症血小板是年轻血液、运动和长寿激素 klotho 带来认知益处的原因https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Platelets-quell-the-inflammation-of-an-aging-brain-and-body-Study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Platelets-quell-the-inflammation-of-an-aging-brain-and-body-Study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96d92af7-3013-4183-9b34-55ec50cad5e0 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 00:49:43 -0400 Platelets quell the inflammation of an aging brain and body: Study finds
男性糖尿病患者更容易下肢截肢将于今年在德国汉堡举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（10 月 2 日至 6 日）上公布的新研究表明，在 1 型和 2 型糖尿病患者中，离婚与与已婚人士相比，下肢截肢 (LLA)（膝盖以下截肢）的风险高出三分之二，并且与女性相比，男性的 LLA 风险高出 57%。这项研究是由瑞典厄勒布鲁厄勒布鲁大学的 Stefan Jansson 博士及其同事进行的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Male-diabetics-more-likely-to-have-lower-limb-amputation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Male-diabetics-more-likely-to-have-lower-limb-amputation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6930b8b6-a232-4147-98b9-e30af0517369 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 00:26:45 -0400 Male diabetics more likely to have lower limb amputation
